sentences.en: "Have you finished with me?" Luke asked, when he had listened to Armstrong's report of his evidence.
sentences.cn: “你已经都问完我了吗？”卢克听完阿姆斯特朗向自己重述的证词后问道。
路克修士将做感恩祷告.

sentences.en: How can you drink so much beer, Luke?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能喝这么多啤酒呢，卢克？

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: Luke answered by tightening his grip on her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 卢克的回应就是把她的肩头抓得更紧了。

sentences.en: Luke badly wanted a pass mark. Still does, I daresay.
sentences.cn: 卢克曾经很想能及格，他大概现在还是很想。
卢克似乎一时心不在焉.

sentences.en: Luke made a rude gesture with his finger.
sentences.cn: 卢克用手指做了个下流的手势。
卢克津津有味地吃着鸡肉三明治。

sentences.en: Luke never tells you the whole story, but you always get the picture.
sentences.cn: 卢克从不告诉你事情的来龙去脉，但你总会弄明白是怎么回事。

sentences.en: Luke sat directly behind the pilot and conversed with him.
sentences.cn: 卢克就坐在飞行员后面，并且和他说着话。

sentences.en: Luke's mother stopped smiling and looked reproachfully at him.
sentences.cn: 卢克的妈妈收起了笑容，用责备的眼光看着他。

sentences.en: So the first casualty of the expedition was Luke himself, who decided to leave.
sentences.cn: 因此这次探险的第一个受害者是卢克自己，他决定离开。

sentences.en: to Luke Peters, cc Janet Gold
sentences.cn: 寄卢克∙彼得斯，抄送珍妮特∙戈尔德

sentences.en: Underneath his outgoing behaviour Luke was shy.
sentences.cn: 在外向活泼的外表下，卢克其实很害羞。

sentences.en: What on earth had Luke done?
